short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Todoist browser extension for automatic Next Actions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We built an extension that lets you link Todoist tasks to each other so that when you complete one, the next is automatically labelled. This lets your workflows move faster as tasks are more quickly surfaced in your (and your colleagues) filters.
